name: toddler
description: UI elements based on helix library

scripts.test-release: clj -X:shadow:showcase:css && npx shadow-cljs -A:shadow:showcase release main --config-merge '{:output-dir "showcase/dev/js" :asset-path "/js" :closure-defines {toddler.showcase/MD_BASE "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gersak/toddler-showcase/refs/heads/main/docs" toddler.showcase/MD_REFRESH_PERIOD 0 toddler.showcase/ROUTER_BASE ""} :compiler-options {:optimizations :advanced :source-map true}}'
scripts.release: clj -X:shadow:showcase:css && npx shadow-cljs -A:shadow:showcase release main --config-merge '{:output-dir "showcase/web/js" :asset-path "/toddler-showcase/js" :closure-defines {toddler.showcase/MD_BASE "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gersak/toddler-showcase/refs/heads/main/docs" toddler.showcase/MD_REFRESH_PERIOD 0 toddler.showcase/ROUTER_BASE "toddler" toddler.showcase/SEARCH_INDEX "/toddler-showcase/docs.index.edn"} :compiler-options {:optimizations :advanced :source-map true}}'
scripts.dev-tauri: clj -X:shadow:showcase:css && npx shadow-cljs -A:shadow:showcase release main --config-merge '{:output-dir "showcase/web/js" :asset-path "/js" :closure-defines {shadow.cljs.devtools.client.env.server_host "x.x.x.x"} :devtools {:use-document-host false}}'

author: Robert Gersak
